enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The US said expansion of rosters should only be done in response to additional tasks.
NEW ZEALAND supported the Secretariat's proposal to integrate the different rosters.

While the EU objected, CANADA supported additional rosters for inventory reviews. Following requests by some Parties, the Chair convened a contact group to consider national systems, adjustments and guidelines.
